page.title: Esparter Digital Service Playbook
page.html:
CAPTURE PLAN DELIVER SUPPORT

Capture

Plan

Deliver

Support

Vision

CX

Iterate

Production

Goals

Architecture

Automate

WebStack maintenance (upgrades)

Requirements

Sprint Team

Deploy

Service Advancement

 People now expect to interact with personal and commercial services through digital channels such as websites, email, and mobile applications. By building digital services that meet their needs, businesses can acquire and retain customers to help them grow and be successful.

However, today, although businesses know what services they want to provide, too many projects do not work as well as expected, are delivered late, or are over budget. Further, because of perceived complexity and high cost, business stakeholders become daunted causing many projects that are essentially good ideas and needed not getting the green light in the first place.

Esparter’s Digital Service Playbook aims to provide a template that helps

  • Concentrate projects on the areas that simplify the essential delivery, deployment and support aspects,

  • Improve project efficiency by providing a central guide and direction and

  • Reduce support costs by supplying a project reference for team members and those joining the project or supporting the service in the future.

Capture Vision ⏩
